![_config.yml](data:image/png;base64,)


The Arduino processor , you can download a program that will manage all these devices for a given algorithm . Thus , you can create an infinite number of unique cool gadgets made ​​with their own hands and their own idea . To get an idea , take a look at the illustration . It does not reflect a millionth of all the possibilities , but still gives the primary idea :
